db:template-query.name: QueryAccountByName
db:template-query.doc:name: Template Query
db:template-query.db:parameterized-query: select AccountNumber, AnnualRevenue, AccountSource, Name, BillingCity, BillingCountry, BillingPostalCode, BillingState, BillingStreet, Description, Fax, Industry, NumberOfEmployees, Phone, Rating, ShippingCity, ShippingCountry, ShippingPostalCode, ShippingState, ShippingStreet, Sic, SicDesc, Site, TickerSymbol, Type, Website, OwnerId, ParentId from Account where Name = ?

db:template-query.db:parameterized-query: UPDATE Account SET accountNumber = ?, annualRevenue = ?, billingCity = ?, accountSource = ?, billingCountry = ?, billingPostalCode = ?, billingState = ?, billingStreet = ?, description = ?, fax = ?, industry = ?, numberOfEmployees = ?, phone = ?, rating = ?, shippingCity = ?, shippingCountry = ?, shippingPostalCode = ?, shippingState = ?, shippingStreet = ?, sic = ?, sicDesc = ?, site = ?, tickerSymbol = ?, type = ?, website = ?, ownerId = ?, parentId = ? WHERE name = ?
